description:
The course "Learning in the Cloud" will give you the opportunity to join the camp of "Cloud Computing" giving you direct application knowledge to create innovative experiences in your learning environment or job training. The tools you will learn in this course are customizable, innovative and provide free services. Optimizing cost and time in training processes. 

                                            Syllabus
                         

What is the cloud?
Cloud Computing
Learning in the Cloud
Benefits and learning achievement in the cloud
Learning Tools in the Cloud
Presentation tools: Prezi, Cacoo, Glogster
A Toolkit Documentation: Dropbox, Dipity and blogger
Collaboration Tools: Google Drive, Padlet and Wikispaces
Communication Tools: Skype, Podomatic and social networks
Multimedia Tools: GoAnimate and Xtranormal
Interactive Tools: Educaplay and Quizrevolution
title: Aprendizaje en la Nube, Herramientas web en el Aula
